attributes.action: Norman Bettison former SY police chief should be stripped of his Knighthood.
attributes.additional_details: The evidence is in the findings of an IPCC Report and the recent unlawful killing verdict returned by the Hillsborough inquest jury.
attributes.background: 96 people attending a football match at Hillsborough were unlawfully killed, when the South Yorkshire police Commander lost control. Subsiqently the then Chief Police Officer Norman Bettison, conduct fell short of that required from an officer of his rank. This was backed up in a report of the IPCC

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions asking for people's honours to be taken away. You can find out more about how honours are taken away here:

https://www.gov.uk/honours
